## Description {#details}

A forward iterator which reads text lines from a buffer.

This class provides a forward iterator interface for reading one line at a time from a buffer. When default constructed the iterator will be the &quot;end&quot; iterator.

The iterator is aware of what line number it is currently processing. It strips blank lines by default, and comment lines given a comment-starting character.

Note that this iterator requires the buffer to be nul terminated.

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/lineiterator-h">LineIterator.h</a>.
